title: Japanese Servers
body: I just made a Japanese account on the League of Legends website for the open beta and I was wondering that when the beta is coming to an end that we would be able to switch these accounts to a different server like JP --> NA, or JP --> EUW. Thanks and if we can, will it cost money?

replies.body:
is the people who only live in NA can enjoy this free for transfer?
I am in HK but it seems that i have to pay if i make this transfer

Hello Indoor Cat,

Live accounts from other regions can transfers to and from the Japan server; similarly, the Open Beta Test accounts should be able to transfer out to other regions. As with live server, transferring to another server will cost RP. 

In regarding what BluesLackSheep said, there are players who are given the ability to transfer to Japan for free for a limited time. More context can be found in the Japan Server Launch FAQ: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207369856-Japan-Server-Launch-FAQ#h2q2
it will cost u if u switch accounts from JP to any other servers, but its free to switch accounts to JP. That s what riot said...however, we need to pay...
